title: My account got hacked
body: Sadly my account got hacked. He hace my log in credentials but I also have it. The problem is I dont have acces to the email that it is verified on the account. Is there a way to change password and/or email for the account?

replies.body: Yeah, we can help!  Our account team can help with updating your info as well as getting the account back into your hands.  Just submit an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
